section.title: Welkom bij het BibleTime-project.
section.para: BibleTime is a Bible study application for Linux. It is based on the K Desktop Environment and uses the Sword programming library to work with Bible texts, commentaries, dictionaries and books provided by the Crosswire Bible Society.

formalpara.title: 2004-01-16: Debian packages available
formalpara.para: Debian packages of BibleTime 1.4 are available now in Debian Unstable. Be sure to get the bibletime-i18n package, too. Kudos to our Debian packager Daniel Glassey for his work!

formalpara.title: 2004-01-11: New translation effort
formalpara.para: First of all we want to wish all of you a truly happy and blessed new year.

As you probably already noticed, there is a new page online called "Translation". This page gives an introduction into how you can help with the translation of the different areas of the BibleTime project, and offers detailed statistics on the completeness of the existing languages. Be sure to check it out.

formalpara.title: 2003-12-29: BibleTime 1.4
formalpara.para: The new version 1.4 of BibleTime is now available for download. 1.4 in comparision with version 1.3 contains a new SwordSetup dialog to setup Sword and to install modules from local sources or from the internet. With the SwordSetup part it's also possible to remove modules from disk. 1.4 also contains many new bugfixes. BibleTime 1.4 is available on our download page.
You need Sword 1.5.7 with enabled curl support to make use of the remote installation features. The binary packages we provide for some of the major linux distributions should work out of the box.
If you run into troubles installing BibleTime or you have problems using it please submit a bugreport. We need your support to improve BibleTime.

formalpara.title: 2003-12-03: BibleTime 1.4beta1
formalpara.para: The first testing version of the upcoming BibleTime 1.4 was released today. The new feature in comparision with 1.3 is the new SwordSetup dialog which makes the Sword and module configuration more userfriendly. Using the dialog you can now setup Sword's configuration files, install modules from the internet or from local sources (e.g. a CD) and also uninstall modules from your system. This beta release also contains some important bugfixes.

This 1.4beta1 release is only meant for testing, so we do not provide binary packages. If you know how to compile programs from source code we encourage you to try this beta1 release. You need Sword 1.5.6 with enabled curl support to make use of the remote installation features.

formalpara.title: 2003-10-19: SuSE 9.0 pakketten
formalpara.para: RPM-pakketten voor SuSE 9.0 zijn nu beschikbaar. Meld problemen aan info@bibletime.info. Dank u!

formalpara.title: 2003-10-16: Nieuwe webpagina's
formalpara.para: BibleTime heeft nu nieuwe webpagina's, die betere navigatie, design en een snellere downloadtijd bieden.
Als u problemen met de pagina's ondervindt laat het ons dan weten!

formalpara.title: 2003-08-23: BibleTime 1.3
formalpara.para: Versie 1.3 van BibleTime is eindelijk beschikbaar. BibleTime 1.3 bevat vele nieuwe mogelijkheden, verbeteringen in de gebruiksmogelijkheden en bugfixes. Wij raden al onze gebruikers ten sterkste aan te upgraden naar versie 1.3. U kunt de software hier downloaden: Download. Binaire pakketten zullen in de komende dagen uitgegeven worden.
Download de bibletime- en de bibletime-i18n-pakketten voor volledige functionaliteit. We excuseren ons voor de lange releasetijd, we hopen met de volgende releases te verkorten.
